msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.title: Job 40
ab.l: Da qaruv berdi H ošol Ijovɣa da ajtty.
Talašyrmo kiši küčlü Tenri byla karatetkeni üčün törelešse Tenri byla qaruv berirmo anar. ופשט שני Talašma küčlü Tenri byla qylyq modu.
Da qaruv berdi Ijov ošol H-ɣa da ajtty.
Muna jengil boldum ne qaruv berejim sana qolumnu qojdum avzuma.
Bir dep sözledim da qaruv bermemen da eki ajttym da arttyrmamen.
Da qaruv berdi H ošol Ijovɣa tavul ašyra da ajtty.
Bajlaɣyn endi jigit kibik bellerinni sorajym senden da bildirgin mana.
Muna buzasen töremni qynɣyr etesen meni ki rast bolɣajsen.
Da muna kičimo kibik Tenrinin sende da avaz byla anyn kibik kökretelimusen.
Jasanɣyn endi öktemlik byla da ulluluq da syj da hörmet kijgin.
Tozdurɣun qaḥyrlaryn ačuvunnun da körip bar öktemni da synyqtyrɣyn any.
Körüp bar öktemni synyqtyrɣyn any da jančqyn rašaʿlarny orunlarynda.
Kömgün alarny topraq ičine birge jüzlerin bajlaɣyn או čergegin jašyryn jerde.
Da daɣy mende maḥtarmen seni ki qutqarsa seni küčün.
Muna endi vehemot ki jarattym qatynda köget syɣyr kibik ašajdy.
Muna endi küčü bellerindedi da quvaty kindiklerinde qursaɣynyn.
Tiz tebretedi qujruɣun erezni kibik žylalary jemertqalarynyn butaqlanadylar.

Ullu süvekleri qurč kesekleri kibik kiči süvekleri temir
tajaqlary kibik.
Oldu bašlyɣy jollarynyn Tenrinin ančaq jaratuvčusu juvutur anyn üstüne qylyčyn.
Ki tavlar bitiš eltediler anar da bar kijigi ol tüznün ojnajdylar anda.
Ullu terekler tübüne jatsa syjynčynda qamušnun da qoɣanyn.
Qaplajdylar any ullu terekler kelege bolma anar quršajdylar any tallary özennin.
Muna ičse özenni tez aqmas išanadyr ki üzüp čyɣaryr Jardenni avzuna.
Közleri byla aladyr any ilinčeklerge tešedi burnun.
Tartalyrmosen livjatanny qarmaq byla da kruk byla qadajalymusen tilin.
Qojalymusen qamuš burnuna da tegenek byla tešelirmusen jajaɣyn.

Arttyryrmo sana jalbarmaqlar jemese sözlermo sana jymšaq
sözler.
Kesermo šert birgene alalyrmusen any ömürlik qulluqqa.
Ojnajalyrmosen anyn byla nečik quš byla da bajlap berimusen any nögerlerine.
Aš jašarlarmo andan joldašlar üleširlermo any bezirgenler arasyna.
Tolturalymusen bučlarɣa terisin da közüvine balyqčylarnyn bašyn. או תאמר פ׳ ב׳ Keselimusen byčaqlarbyla terisin da süngüsü byla balyqlarnyn bašyn.
Qojɣunča anyn üstüne uvučunnu saɣynsan čerivni arttyrmassen.
Muna išančy anyn jalɣandyr muna kergečoq any jyɣylyr.

app.note: JSul.I.04: The Karaim equivalent of the standard Hebrew Job 40:1 is not included in the text, probably intentionally, see Job 3:1, 4:1, etc. for similar cases. The text is reconstructed here on the basis of ms. ADub.III.84. The Hebrew text is not omitted, see BHeb. וַיַּעַן יְהוָה אֶת־אִיֹּוב וַיֹּאמַר ‘Moreover the Lord answered Job, and said’ (Job 40:1). | C: Da ǯoɣap berdi H Ijovɣa da ajtty. | QB: Da ǯoɣap berdi H Ijovɣa da ajtty. | ADub.III.84: Da qaruv berdi H osol Ijovɣa da ajtty. | Kobeckaitė (2019): Da qaruv berdi Tenri Ijovɣa da ajtty.

An alternative translation to talašyrmo kiši küčlü Tenri byla karatetkeni üčün, the equivalent of BHeb. הֲרֹב עִם־שַׁדַּי יִסֹּור ‘Shall he that contends with the Almighty instruct him?’, added after Heb. ופשט שני ‘and a second interpretation’. | C: talašma qadir Täŋri bilän ügütmidir. | QB: talašma qadir Täŋri bilän ügütmidir. | ADub.III.84: talasalyrmo kisi küclü Tenri byla karatetkeni ücün any פשט שני talašma küclü Tenri byla qylyq modur. | Kobeckaitė (2019): talašalyr-mo ḱučĺu Tenri byla had́epĺanǵań.

JSul.I.04: The Karaim equivalent of the standard Hebrew Job 40:3 is not included in the text, probably intentionally, see Job 3:1, 4:1, etc. for similar cases. The text is reconstructed here on the basis of ADub.III.84. The Hebrew text is not omitted, see BHeb. וַיַּעַן אִיֹּוב אֶת־יְהוָה וַיֹּאמַר ‘Then Job answered the Lord and said’ (Job 40:3). | C: Da ǯoɣap berdi Ijov H-ɣa da ajtty. | QB: Da ǯoɣap berdi Ijov H-ɣa da ajtty. | ADub.III.84: Da qaruv berdi Ijov osol H-ɣa da ajtty. | Kobeckaitė (2019): Da qaruv berdi Ijov Tenriǵa da ajtty.

JSul.I.04: The Karaim equivalent of the standard Hebrew Job 40:6 is not included in the text, probably intentionally, see Job 3:1, 4:1, etc. for similar cases. The text is reconstructed here on the basis of ms. ADub.III.84. The Hebrew text is not omitted, see BHeb. וַיַּעַן־יְהוָה אֶת־אִיֹּוב מִן סְעָרָה וַיֹּאמַר ‘Then answered the Lord unto Job out of the whirlwind, and said.’ (Job 40:6). | C: Da ǯoɣap berdi H Ijovɣa davuldan da ajtty. | QB: Da ǯoɣap berdi H Ijovɣa davuldan da ajtty. | ADub.III.84: Da qaruv berdi H osol Ijovɣa tavul asyra da ajtty. | Kobeckaitė (2019): Da qaruv berdi Tenri Ijovɣa ol tavuldan da ajtty.
JSul.I.04: bilegin; a scribal error; see next footnote.
An alternative translation to bilegin, the equivalent of BHeb. חֲבֹשׁ ‘bind’, added after Heb. או ‘or’. | C: baɣlaɣyn. | QB: baɣlaɣyn. | ADub.III.84: qaplaɣyn. | Kobeckaitė (2019): č́erǵagiń.

In the standard Hebrew Bible, Job 41 begins here. In the Karaim tradition of translating the Hebrew Bible, verses Job 41:1–9 are added to chapter 40. This is the case also in mss. C, QB, and ADub.III.84. In Kobeckaitė (2019), Job 41:1–8 are added to chapter 40.

An alternative translation of Job 40:31; Job 41:7 in the standard Hebrew Bible. Added after Heb. או תאמר פ׳ ב׳ ‘or say a second interpretation’. | C: Kesärmisin pyčaqlar bilän terisin da kämäči bilän balyqlarnyŋ bašyn. | QB: Kesärmisin pyčaqlar bilän terisin da kämäči bilän balyqlarnyŋ bašyn. | ADub.III.84: keselirmusen byčaqlar byla terisin da singisi byla balyq{{čy}}larnyn bašyn. פשט שני tolturalymusen bucqalarɣa basyn da terisin da kamusuna balcyklarnyn basyn. | Kobeckaitė (2019): teš́alirmusun śunǵu byla terisin da čačḥysy byla balyḥlarnyn bašy.
